segments.text: I notice the woman is very focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the puddle growing larger and larger on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is wet, but she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must be deep in thought or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite bold, taking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, and it looks really unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching him reach for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for her share, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mother is so distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I don't want to cause a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is both amusing and a bit concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR
